name: Negative Platform
description:
A and D to move

W or Space to jump

R to Restart

You can skip levels by hitting ENTER the NUMBER of the level you want to go too (starting from 0) and ENTER again.

This game was made in Unity 2017.2.0f3 Personal buy Izzy Padon with the following unity assets:

2D CameraManager by Stephan

BitMusic Pack by ASSETCREW

Low Poly Shaders by by Broken Vector
